content: join with a slip_stitch to first bpsc turn 29 round 8 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in all sts to end join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 2 turn 29 round 9 as round 3 14 stars round 10 as round 4 14 finished stars round 11 as round 5 29 round 12 as round 6 29 round 13 as round 7 29 round 14 as round 8 29 round 15 chain 3 *fpdc around next st bpdc around next st* repeat from*to* join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 do not turn 29 round 16 chain 3 *fpdc around next st bpdc around next st* repeat from*to* join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 29 fasten_off edging buttonbands and buttonhole row row 1 with rs facing join yarn to lower edge of right hand side of front edge chain 1 single_crochet in same st work 35 single_crochet evenly up front edge to corner 3 single_crochet in corner 1 single_crochet in all sts around the neck till next corner 3 single_crochet in corner work 35 single_crochet evenly down front edge to corner turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in next 17 sts chain 2 skip 1 st 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts chain 2 skip 1 st 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts chain 2 skip 1 st the middle st of corner from last round 1 single_crochet in each st around 3 single_crochet in corner the middle st of corner from last round 1 single_crochet in each st to end turn row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet till the corner 3 single_crochet in corner the middle st of corner from last round 1 single_crochet in each st around 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space 1 single_crochet in each st to end fasten_off k a m e crochet designs 2018 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved finishing the cardigan close small gaps under arm weave in all ends sew on buttons to correspond with buttonholes hat note up to row 5 you don t turn your work and chain 3 up to row 5 does not count as a st round 1 start with a magic_ring chain 3 14dc into magic_ring slip_stitch to join to top of first double_crochet dnt 14 round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each st to end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet dnt 28 round 3 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat *to* till end join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet dnt 42 round 4 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next
